answers.answer: Hi!Pain in sides can be a symptom of anxiety. Do deep breathing exercises and see if it helps. It can also be due to gas in abdomen. Hence walk around and take antacids and see if it helps relieve the pain. It can also be due to anemia, low calcium, low iron etc—so get this tested. Pinched nerves or peripheral neuropathy due to thyroid problems or diabetes too could be the cause.Please consult your PCP for primary examination followed by proper referral.Take care!

question: okay so lately ive been feeling pain in my sides which it feels like its my lungs i had bloodwork done & a xray done & nothing came up. i cant understand what can be causeing me to feel like this .The pain in my sides is my only symptom besides my anxiety .
title: pain
